code: import React,{useEffect}from"react";var DynamicText=function DynamicText(){var array=["Php","Mysql","Laravel","Symphony","Javascript","React","Html","Css"];var wordIndex=0;var letterIndex=0;useEffect(function(){var target=document.getElementById("text-target");var createLetter=function createLetter(){var letter=document.createElement("span");target.appendChild(letter);letter.classList.add("letter");letter.style.opacity="0";letter.style.animation="anim 5s ease forwards";letter.textContent=array[wordIndex][letterIndex];setTimeout(function(){letter.remove();},2000);};var loop=function loop(){setTimeout(function(){if(wordIndex>=array.length){wordIndex=0;letterIndex=0;loop();}else if(letterIndex<array[wordIndex].length){createLetter();letterIndex++;loop();}else{letterIndex=0;wordIndex++;setTimeout(function(){loop();},2000);}},80);};loop();},[]);return/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("span",{className:"dynamic-text"},/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("span",{className:"simply"},"Developpeur junior"),/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("span",{id:"text-target"}));};export default DynamicText;
